meta.description:
A company needs to decide whether to hire some of the five candidates to join their research and development team. The salary requirements for candidates F, G, H, I, and J are $12,000, $15,000, $18,000, $5,000, and $10,000 respectively. The company wants to minimize the total amount paid to the candidates while staying within the budget.

The company has a budget of $40,000 and wants to hire a maximum of 4 new employees.

The skill levels of the candidates are as follows:
Candidate F: Level 2
Candidate G: Level 3
Candidate H: Level 4
Candidate I: Level 1
Candidate J: Level 2
The company needs to ensure that the total skill level of the hired employees is at least 8.

The project management experience in years for each candidate is as follows:
Candidate F: 1 year
Candidate G: 2 years
Candidate H: 2 years
Candidate I: 5 years
Candidate J: 4 years
They want the total project management experience in the team to be at least 8 years.

Due to the similar technical backgrounds of candidates G and J, the company can only choose one of them at most.

params.name: experience
params.description: Project management experience in years for each candidate

vars.name: hire
vars.description: Binary decision variable for hiring each candidate

objective.name: minimize_salary
objective.expr: quicksum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
objective.description: Minimize total salary of hired candidates

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
constraints.description: Total salary must not exceed the budget

constraints.name: max_hires
constraints.description: Maximum of 4 candidates can be hired

constraints.name: skill_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(skill_level[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
constraints.description: Total skill level of hired candidates must be at least 8

constraints.name: experience_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(experience[c] * hire[c] for c in Candidates)
constraints.description: Total project management experience must be at least 8 years

constraints.name: mutual_exclusion_G_J
constraints.description: At most one of candidates G and J can be hired
